title: Trinkets
desc:
- Cannot be played normally, if somehow played by a card effect, it acts as <:wild:1106237191388143838> and whoever played will draw the <:trinket:1141745128898310144> played.
- Each <:trinket:1141745128898310144> has a passive effect when on hand.
- Each player can only have up to 2 <:trinket:1141745128898310144> in their hand, if they have 3 or more when their turn starts, they must discard to reach 2.
- You may spend a turn to discard a <:trinket:1141745128898310144>, <:trinket:1141745128898310144> cards cannot be frozen.
- Most effects are secret unless specified otherwise, if something more public happens(Drawing, Discarding, Immunity), the action log will not specify the cause.
